comments.raw_text: It's useful for mobile web apps, especially games, to indicate an orientation that the phone should be locked in.  This can be something as simple as orientation=auto (default) or portrait or landscape in the viewport tag.  Would be a big boost in usability and should be simple to implement.
comments.creator: vladimir@pobox.com
